revised_title: Thermal Processes in the Formation of Continental Lithosphere
tldr: The authors discuss the factors that influence the temperature distribution in the continental lithosphere, focusing on the thickness and mode of origin of the lithosphere. They explore the effects of radioactivity, erosion, and conductive cooling on the temperature distribution and how these factors may have varied with time. The authors also consider the role of plate tectonics in shaping the thermal gradients within the lithosphere.
